discover_requests.title: EV charging within a circular boundary
discover_requests.description: Find stations within 10 km of the user’s point.

discover_requests.title: EV charging along a route
discover_requests.description: Find stations within 5 km of the Bengaluru→Mysuru corridor.

discover_requests.title: EV charging within circle + connector filters
discover_requests.description: Limit to CCS2 connectors with ≥50 kW within 10 km.

discover_requests.title: EV charging within circle + vehicle spec filters
discover_requests.description: User requires CCS2 and ≥60 kW within 8 km of a point.

discover_requests.title: EV charging by specific CPO
discover_requests.description: Filter items to those offered by a specific provider/operator.

discover_requests.title: View single charging station by Item id
discover_requests.description: Fetch details for one station using its Item identifier.

discover_requests.title: Fetch specific EVSE on-site by EVSE id
discover_requests.description: Find a particular connector/EVSE at the site using its public EVSE identifier.
